short_summary: Botsford public wharf located in Murray Corner, New Brunswick: furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the reconstruction of the existing boat launching ramp.
description:
General Requirements:

	The work covered under this project at Botsford public wharf located in Murray Corner, Westmorland County, New Brunswick, consists of furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the reconstruction of the existing boat launching ramp.

The work under this contract consists of, but is not be limited to, the supply and installation of: temporary water control structures, dewatering, demolition of the existing ramp and partial demolition of existing adjacent timber crib, removal and disposal of demolished materials such as concrete and creosote timber, construction of a new reinforced concrete ramp including excavation, geotextile filter fabric, rock fills, sub-base materials, rip-rap, rebar, and cast-in-place concrete, asphalt paving including new gravel and new asphalt base and seal, site restoration, and cleanup.

one only 
 items in the Unit Price Table will be measured for payment. All other work necessary to complete the Contract will be considered incidental to the project and will not be measured separately for payment.

The offer must be received by 13:00 (local time) on 12 January 2023.
